title: After school
content:
After school, I usually go home with my friends.
We walk together, and sometimes we talk about our day.
When I get home, I have a snack.
My favorite is a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.
It's so yummy! Then, I do my homework.
Sometimes, it's a little tricky, but I always try my best.
I know that doing homework is important.Once my homework is done, I like to play outside.
I ride my bike or play with my dog in the yard.
It's so much fun!
